title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Here are answers to some common questions from our customers.

faqs.question: Can I really eat it raw?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use a variety called 'Welcome' grown in greenhouses. It's sweet and tender, making it delicious even when eaten raw.

faqs.question: How should I store it?
faqs.answer: Keep it in the bag and store upright in the fridge. Putting about 1cm of water in the bottom of the bag helps keep it fresh longer.

faqs.question: How long should I boil it?
faqs.answer: Peel about 15cm from the root end with a peeler and boil for about 30 seconds. Itâ€™s soft and stringless.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: Online store payments are accepted. If ordering via LINE, cash on delivery is also available.

faqs.question: What about delivery?
faqs.answer: We ship freshly harvested asparagus with care. Please check delivery schedules on each online site.
